title: 201. How Do We Know What Really Works in Healthcare?
description: A lot of the conventional wisdom in medicine is nothing more than hunch or wishful thinking. A new breed of data detectives is hoping to change that.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: A lot of the conventional wisdom in medicine is nothing more than hunch or wishful thinking. A new breed of data detectives is hoping to change that.
